name: Youth Programs
description: The LightHouse offers a diverse variety of outings, social events, and personal/professional development opportunities for children of all ages and young adults through the following youth programs: - Youth Social & Recreational (Middle and High school) - Transition Programs (High school and post-secondary) - Summer Programs for Transition-Aged Youth - Enchanted Hills Camp (EHC) Counselor-in-Training and Leadership Development Program - Family Programs for all families with at least one blind or
fullDescription: The LightHouse offers a diverse variety of outings, social events, and personal/professional development opportunities for children of all ages and young adults through the following youth programs: - Youth Social & Recreational (Middle and High school) - Transition Programs (High school and post-secondary) - Summer Programs for Transition-Aged Youth - Enchanted Hills Camp (EHC) Counselor-in-Training and Leadership Development Program - Family Programs for all families with at least one blind or
whatTheyOffer: The LightHouse offers a diverse variety of outings, social events, and personal/professional development opportunities for children of all ages and young adults through the following youth programs: - Youth Social & Recreational (Middle and High school) - Transition Programs (High school and post-secondary) - Summer Programs for Transition-Aged Youth - Enchanted Hills Camp (EHC) Counselor-in-Training and Leadership Development Program - Family Programs for all families with at least one blind or
howToGetIt: For more information about the youth program or to sign up for our monthly LightHouse Youth and Family Events List, please reach out to a member of the Youth Services team by email at youth@lighthouse-sf.org or subscribe to our weekly E Newsletter
agency: LightHouse For The Blind And Visually Impaired
